Name: amoxicillin
notes: can crystallize/harden if not immediately vortexed during resuspension; additionally, crashes out when thawed from -80 degrees (10 mg/mL stock)

Name: ampicillin
solubility: 1 M NH4OH (50 mg/mL); H2O (lab stock - 100 mg/mL)

Name: ceftazidime hydrate
notes: contains 10% sodium carbonate as stabilizer; cayman chem recommends not storing aqueous solution for more than a day

Name: ciprofloxacin
notes: NOT SOLUBLE at 2 mg/mL in H2O

Name: tazobactam sodium salt
solubility: EtOH (5 mg/mL); DMSO (20 mg/mL); DMF (25 mg/mL)

Name: tobramycin
solubility: H2O (94 mg/mL); DMSO (<1 mg/mL); PBS (10 mg/mL)

Name: MES buffer
location (container): RT, chem cabinet, BUFFERS (top right shelf)

Name: MOPS buffer
location (container): RT, chem cabinet, BUFFERS (top right shelf)

Name: Biotin
alternative name: Vitamin H, D-Biotin, Bios II, Vitamin B7, Coenzyme R

Name: Calcium pantothenate
alternative name:
vitamin B5, D-pantothenic acid
hemicalcium salt

Name: Phosphate buffered saline, 10X
location (container): RT, chem cabinet, BUFFERS (top right shelf)

Name: Sodium citrate tribasic dihydrate
alternative name: Citric acid trisodium salt dihydrate,  Trisodium citrate dihydrate

Name: Tris buffer
location (container): RT, chem cabinet, BUFFERS (top right shelf)

Name: L-glutamic acid and potassium salt monohydrate
FM™ 4-64FX

Name: Non-idet P-40
location (container): RT, chem cabinet, upper left rack
notes: Gift from Landick lab. May develop turbidity or sediment during storage. A clear liquid can be obtained on heating to 40°C.

location (container): RT, chem cabinet, upper left rack
